nodes.text: Irvin Kershner: Remembering The Empire Strikes Back

Irvin Kershner: Remembering The Empire Strikes Back is an exclusive interview with Irvin Kershner, director of the 1980 film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, appearing in The Lucasfilm Fan Club Magazine 11. The article was written by Dan Madsen.
